titleStmt.title: The vvorks of William Bridge, sometime fellow of Emmanuel Colledge in Cambridge: now preacher of the Word of God at Yarmouth. The second volumn. [sic] Viz. 1. Grace for grace; or, The overflowing of Christs fulness received by all saints. II. The spiritual actings of faith through natural impossibilities. III. Evangelical repentance.
titleStmt.author: Bridge, William, 1600?-1670.
Yates, John, d. ca. 1660.
Greenhill, William, 1591-1671.
Adderley, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Cole, at the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Editors' note "To the reader" signed: William Greenhil, William Adderley, Iohn Yates.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange
